<SCRIPT language="JavaScript">
<!--
function popwin () {
var page = "http://www.amazon.co.uk/exec/obidos/subst/new-visitor-reward/nvr-pop.html/026-2634699-7306802";
windowprops = "height=360,width=326,location=no,scrollbars=no,menubars=no,toolbars=no,resizable=no,screenX=0,screenY=0";
window.open(page, "Popup", windowprops);
}
function getCookieVal (offset) {
var endstr = document.cookie.indexOf (";", offset);
if (endstr == -1)
endstr = document.cookie.length;
return unescape(document.cookie.substring(offset, endstr));
}
function GetCookie (name) {
var arg = name + "=";
var alen = arg.length;
var clen = document.cookie.length;
var i = 0;
while (i < clen) {
var j = i + alen;
if (document.cookie.substring(i, j) == arg)
return getCookieVal (j);
i = document.cookie.indexOf(" ", i) + 1;
if (i == 0) break;
}
return null;
}
function SetCookie (name,value,expires,path,domain,secure) {
document.cookie = name + "=" + escape (value) +
((expires) ? "; expires=" + expires.toGMTString() : "") +
((path) ? "; path=" + path : "") +
((domain) ? "; domain=" + domain : "") +
((secure) ? "; secure" : "");
}
function DeleteCookie (name,path,domain) {
if (GetCookie(name)) {
document.cookie = name + "=" +
((path) ? "; path=" + path : "") +
((domain) ? "; domain=" + domain : "") +
"; expires=Thu, 01-Jan-70 00:00:01 GMT";
}
}
var exp = new Date();
exp.setTime(exp.getTime() + (12*60*60*1000));
function popWinC() {
var popval = GetCookie('seenpop');
if (popval == null) {
popval=1;
SetCookie('seenpop', popval, exp, "/");
var test = GetCookie('seenpop');
if (test != null){
popwin();
}
}
}
// -->
</script>
<body bgcolor="#FFFFFF" link="#003399" alink="#FF9933" vlink="#996633" text="#000000" onload="popWinC()">

Welcome

<p>
<font face="verdana, arial, helvetica" size="-1"><b><font color="#CC6600">Hello!</font> Already a customer? </b><a href="/exec/obidos/flex-sign-in/ref=cs_sig_h_1_1/026-2634699-7306802?opt=o&page=help/hp-sign-in-secure.html&response=subst/instant-recs/instant-recs-home.html">Sign in</a> to get Instant Recommendations.</font> <p>
<span class="small">
<center> <A href=http://www.amazon.co.uk/exec/obidos/amabot-redirect/026-2634699-7306802?path=http://www.amazon.co.uk/exec/obidos/tg/browse/-/1204872/ref=amb_center-1_27847/026-2634699-7306802&locid=338652&campid=27847&hmac=ABA2401177C1EBCCD4C5B3FA9FAB07CF76A5F63F><img src="http://images-eu.amazon.com/images/G/02/uk-welcome/misc/xmas-tcg1-300x108.gif" width=300 height=108 border=0 valign=top align=center></A> </center>
</span>
<br clear=all><br>
<span class="small">
<B>First-time visitors</B>--find out <A href=http://www.amazon.co.uk/exec/obidos/amabot-redirect/026-2634699-7306802?path=http://www.amazon.co.uk/exec/obidos/tg%2Fstores%2Fbrowse%2F-%2Fhelp%2F512186%2F/ref=amb_center-2_26931/026-2634699-7306802&locid=62211&campid=26931&hmac=DCA44E1659436FD75BAD466D750A869EE45796B6>how to order</A> and visit our <A href=http://www.amazon.co.uk/exec/obidos/amabot-redirect/026-2634699-7306802?path=http://www.amazon.co.uk/exec/obidos/tg%2Fstores%2Fbrowse%2F-%2Fhelp%2F471044/ref=amb_center-2_26931/026-2634699-7306802&locid=62211&campid=26931&hmac=E35AE64FCC06A17FC87B6AB2458D44C5F16FF94F>Help Desk</A> for the answers to your questions.
</span>
<br clear=all><br>
<span class="small">
<b class="h1">DVD Delight</b><br clear=left>
<a href="/exec/obidos/ASIN/B000094SBX/ref=amb_center-3_35862/026-2634699-7306802"><img src="http://images-eu.amazon.com/images/P/B000094SBX.02._OU02_PIuk-r-fd-0,BottomRight,10,10_SCTZZZZZZZ_.jpg" border=0 hspace=5 vspace=5 align=left valign=top></a>

<b class=h1>
Dude, Where's My Country?
</b>

&#149; <a href=http://www.amazon.co.uk/exec/obidos/amabot-redirect/026-2634699-7306802?path=http%3A//www.amazon.co.uk/exec/obidos/tg/stores/static/-/gifts/gift-services/ref%3Dgive%5Fw%5Fh%5F%5F3&locid=338653&campid=35895&hmac=B39BA9A1172F653A20D63DDA1BA5A2E858355867> Gift Services</a><br />
